title: Custom Builds
body:
In the last later updates you were able to save a build for a champion of choice. I was wondering if there is any way to do that in the newest update. If not is there any way to get the later update back?
Sincerely, 
                   Jackson Spottswood

replies.body:
Item sets aren't currently in the updated client.  You can return to the legacy client while testing continues to update your item lists:

-  On the login screen of the open beta updated client, look for the "Launch Legacy Client" text at the bottom.
-  Or create a shortcut directly to the legacy client in your League Installation. Just look for "lol.launcher"

I hope that helps!
